g.G4521: the Sabbath (i.e. Shabbath), or day of weekly repose from secular avocations (also the observance or institution itself); by extension, a se'nnight...
g.G2596: (prepositionally) down (in place or time), in varied relations (according to the case (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined)
